summary: Thomas M. Disch's sequel, based on the book sequel, has our heroes zooming off to, of all places, Mars.
cast: Thurl Ravenscroft|Deanna Oliver|Eric Lloyd|Timothy Stack|Roger Kabler|Andy Milder|Fyvush Finkel|Stephen Tobolowsky|Farrah Fawcett|Redmond O'Neal|Wayne Knight|Jessica Tuck|Chris Young|Russi Taylor|Brian Doyle-Murray|Carol Channing|Marc Allen Lewis|Rick Logan|Susie Stevens-Logan|Paddi Edwards|James Murray|DeForest Kelley|Ross Mapletoft|Kath Soucie|Jeff Robertson|Alan King|Susan Boyd|Liz Callaway|Carmen Carter|Randy Crenshaw|Jim Cummings|Marva Hicks|Linda Harmon|Jon Joyce|Geoff Koch|Maxine Waters Willard|Sally Stevens|Julia Waters|Terry Wood|Charlie Adler|Eric Bauza|Jeff Bennett|Jodi Benson|Mary Kay Bergman|Corey Burton|Dan Castellaneta|Cathy Cavadini|Cam Clarke|Mona Marshall|Anndi McAfee|Susan Silo|Francesca Marie Smith|Jill Talley|Ed Gilbert
director: Directors: Robert C. Ramirez, Patrick A. Ventura
title: The Brave Little Toaster Goes to Mars
